des: The purpose of this alexa skill is to spread the awareness and information about the famous fesival Halloween. It tells the intersting and scary facts about the halloween that will surely amaze the user. Each time the user invokes this skill, a random fact is being gnerated and delievred.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
